Version 2020.6.2

Jun 2, 2020
Mac, Windows
  • You can add background videos.
  • The “Round” font group has been added.
  • The new text styles “Cover”, “Cube”, “Stamp”, “Uncover” have been added.
  • You can apply “3D rotation” to the text.
  • The rendering quality has been improved.
  • The usability of the editor has been improved.
  • Minor issues have been fixed.

Version 3.9.3

Mar 1, 2020
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a new “Canvas” feature
  • Adds a new “Frame” background style
  • Adds new “Blur”, “Pulse” background options
  • Adds a new “Damion” font
  • Improves the editor usability
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.8.5

Jan 15, 2020
Mac, Windows
  • Adds new “Girassol”, “Righteous”, “Underwood Champion” fonts
  • Adds a “Pin sidebar” option in the settings
  • Improves the menu bar
  • Improves stability
  • Performance increase

Version 3.7.4

Dec 20, 2019
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a new “Blur” text & background style
  • Wide text area
  • Improves stability
  • Performance increase
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.6.8

Oct 8, 2019
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a new “Gmarket Sans” font
  • Adds new “Acceleration”, “Rotation” options
  • Improves the editor usability
  • Improves stability

Version 3.3.6

Jul 1, 2019
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a zoom feature to the editor
  • Improves video quality
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.3.0

May 12, 2019
Mac, Windows
  • Adds new “Abyssinica”, “Fondamento”, “Uncial Antiqua” fonts
  • Removes “Seoul Hangang”, “Seoul Namsan” fonts due to memory problems
  • Improves stability
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.2.8

Mar 1, 2019
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a new “GFS Neohellenic” font
  • Improves stability
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.2.4

Nov 8, 2018
Mac, Windows
  • Adds new “Teko”, “Rasa” fonts
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.2.0

Sep 4, 2018
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a new “Direction Sign” text style
  • Removes the preview when exporting to increase performance
  • Removes the background color to increase performance
  • Improves stability
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.1.6

Aug 4, 2018
Mac, Windows
  • Adds new “Bebas Neue” font
  • Adds a new “Ken Burns” text style
  • Improves usability
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.1.0

Jul 20, 2018
Mac, Windows
  • Adds a new “Dissolve & Scale” text style
  • Wide preview screen
  • Improves performance
  • Improves stability
  • Fixes minor issues

Version 3.0.0

Jul 1, 2018
Mac, Windows
  • Adds beautiful, free photos
  • Adds more effects
  • Adds new fonts
  • Supports .wav format
  • Improves performance
  • Improves stability
  • Fixes minor issues
